# Lux Cash

> Stablecoin and fiat on/off-ramp for Lux Network.

## About
Lux Cash provides stablecoin services and fiat on/off-ramp capabilities for Lux Network. It enables users to convert between fiat currencies and crypto, manage stablecoins, and facilitate payments with price-stable digital assets. The platform bridges traditional finance and the Lux blockchain ecosystem.

## Key Features
- Fiat on-ramp: buy crypto with bank transfer, debit card, or wire
- Fiat off-ramp: convert crypto to fiat and withdraw
- Stablecoin management (USDC, USDT, DAI on Lux)
- Instant settlement on Lux Network
- Low conversion fees
- Multi-currency support (USD, EUR, GBP, and more)
- KYC/AML compliance for fiat operations
- API for programmatic on/off-ramp integration
- Merchant payment processing with fiat settlement
